-e ---

𓋏 Ba’at Bat 𓆤

𓉞 Hathor ⇔ Bat ⇔ 𓉔 Balat B‘LT
"The Semites writing these Alphabet texts (on a sphinx) appear to equate Hathor with their goddess, Ba‘alat."

𒀭𒂗 𒌑 𒀭𒃽𒐊 Bēl and Bēltija

𒁁𒈝 BE.LUM Baal 𓎟 ᵇALL bowl 𓎟 ᵏALL 𒆰𒆳

𒂗 ⋍ 𒉺𒋼𒋛𒃻 Patesi ≈ puzur > pa'ria > 𒂗 Baal

𒁁𒉌 bar.ni > prince > be.eli baal bel

𒁁𒇻 be-lu < Baal < Ba'al < bassileo 𓆤
𒁁𒇻 come to an end, lord, proprietor, to be extinguished

"owner"
𒁁BÀD patron პატრონი ṗaṭroni propietari
𒁁𒂖 beˢel "owner" … 𒁁𒊩 be.sal 𒁁𒋛 be.si Besitzer
𒁁𒂖 beˢel basileús 𓆤 𓆥 poseedor possessor ⇔ 𒋛𒁁 صاحب ṣāḥiba
𒁁𒂖 be-el(si) вла̑сница
𒁁𒇷 beᵐli pemilik punya মালিক مالک mâlek 𓆤

𒂖𒁁 ≈ 𒁮 DAM Dame "Lady"
𒎏 𒊩𒌆 Bêlit 𓏏 Belle-Lady bêltum Balat
𒂖 𒊩⋅𒋛 mun⋅si ≈ sun & moon in 𒉿𒂖 "year" /piel/ /bel/ 𒁁𒌌 ⇔ Baal

𒁁𒇻 Baal < PIR in Napir nabu 𓎟 𓋞 ⇔ poly
𒁁𒇻 Baal < puzur 𒂗

lord ⇔ en 𒂗

𓆤 | king of Lower Egypt | ⲃⲁⲥⲓⲗⲉⲩⲥ ⋍ bee.lower/rex ⇔ Baal

𒁈 BÁRA preike(stuhl) 𒉺𒊩𒆠 pa-rak-ki preachers-throne-dais > Baal

Balat < Braut

𓈖 𓐍 𓃀 𓇑 𓏏 𓅐 | Nekhbet | •necro Balat / Banat
